code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./NoticeBoard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const noticeData=[{id:1,title:'마이니모에입니다',writer:'관리자',date:'2025.07.17 13:28'},{id:2,title:'마이니모에 정식오픈 안내',writer:'관리자',date:'2024.12.06 17:30'},{id:3,title:'마포점 영업시간 변경안내 (11/6부터)',writer:'관리자',date:'2023.11.02 12:08'}];function NoticeBoard(){const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState('');const filtered=noticeData.filter(notice=>notice.title.includes(keyword));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notice-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Notice"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"notice-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uBC88\uD638"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uC81C\uBAA9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uAE00\uC4F4\uC774"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uB4F1\uB85D\uC77C"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:filtered.map(notice=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{"data-label":"\uBC88\uD638",children:"\uACF5\uC9C0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{"data-label":"\uC81C\uBAA9",children:notice.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{"data-label":"\uAE00\uC4F4\uC774",children:notice.writer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{"data-label":"\uB4F1\uB85D\uC77C",children:notice.date})]},notice.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notice-cards",children:filtered.map(notice=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notice-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"notice-title",children:["[\uACF5\uC9C0] ",notice.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"notice-meta",children:[notice.writer," / ",notice.date]})]},notice.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notice-search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\uAC80\uC0C9",value:keyword,onChange:e=>setKeyword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\uAC80\uC0C9"})]})]});}export default NoticeBoard;
